title: Kristen Bell and Dax Shephard are ready for Halloween as they cuddle up in matching pajamas
text:
They recently celebrated their sixth wedding anniversary.

And on Saturday, Kristen Bell and Dax Shephard looked ever so much in love as they cuddled up in matching pajamas.

Kristen, 39, shared the cute snap of the couple to her Instagram page.

Cute: On Saturday, Kristen Bell, 39, and Dax Shephard, 44, looked ever so much in love as they cuddled up in matching pajamas

The 39-year-old wore her chin-length, blonde hair down down, and accessorized with earrings and a black headband. Kristen chose comfortable yellow shoes, while Dax, 44, stuck to Converse sneakers.

The star captioned the snap with simple pumpkin and orange emojis, before letting her followers know the brand.

'(Jammies @happyhannas),' she wrote.

In sync: The duo stared into each other's eyes as they appeared to dance in their kitchen

Good idea: The comedic couple also got creative with their carving skills and carved an orange

The loved-up duo recently celebrated their sixth wedding anniversary, though Kristen says that she and her hubby do not remember the date.

'We were reminded by family and friends that at some point last week, it was our 5 year wedding anniversary. In truth, neither of us remember which day,' she began.

'Thats because we have been living the celebration of our commitment every moment since. I find when you are living with gratitude each moment, the dates become irrelevant. To get to wake up next to someone who has put hard work, respectful fights, patience, understanding and gratitude into your relationship is the definition of love. I will never remember the date of our anniversary @daxshepard, and i know you wont either. And thats just one more thing i love about us.'

According to Us Weekly, the couple married on October 16, 2013 in a courthouse wedding. They share daughters Delta, four, and Lincoln, six.

Whoops: The loved-up duo recently celebrated their sixth wedding anniversary, though Kristen says that she and her hubby do not remember the date

Kristen currently stars as Eleanor Shellstrop in The Good Place. She's also set to return to her role as Anna in Frozen 2.

She'll also star in the TV series' Do, Re & Mi, Central Park and in the film, Queenpins.

Meanwhile, Dax stars as Mike in Bless This Mess.
